entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
